summary: This bill, the "Coordinating and Aligning Records to Improve and Normalize Governance for Our Veterans Health Act of 2025" (CARING for Our Veterans Health Act of 2025), mandates the Under Secretary for Health of the Department of Veterans Affairs to improve coordination between VA medical centers and community care providers. This includes developing guidance for obtaining medical documentation, establishing performance goals, ensuring provider training, and improving communication. The Under Secretary must also report to Congress on the implementation progress.
